repair.repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:3.10

RUN apt-get update -y && \
apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y mosquitto
COPY . /app
WORKDIR /app
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir -e .
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir pytest coverage pytest-cov
RUN py3clean .
CMD mosquitto -d && mosquitto -p 1885 -d && mosquitto -p 1886 -d && pytest -v --cov flask_mqtt
